      • getURLSchema

        public static String getURLSchema(String url)
        get schema from url 
           "http://www.test.com/app" -> "http"
   "https://www.test.com/app" -> "https"
        Parameters:
        url - url string
        Returns:
        schema

      • getURLDomain

        public static String getURLDomain(String url)
        get domain from url 
           "http://www.test.com/app" -> "www.test.com"
        Parameters:
        url - url string
        Returns:
        domain

      • getURLRootLength

        public static int getURLRootLength(String url)
        get root length from url 
           http://www.test.com     = [http://www.test.com]
   http://www.test.com/    = [http://www.test.com]
   http://www.test.com/app = [http://www.test.com]
   null                    = -1
   ""                      = -1
   /app                    = -1
   app                     = -1
        Parameters:
        url - url string
        Returns:
        root length

      • getURLRoot

        public static String getURLRoot(String url)
        get root from url 
           "http://www.test.com/app" -> "http://www.test.com"
        Parameters:
        url - url string
        Returns:
        root

      • getURLParent

        public static String getURLParent(String url)
        Gets the parent path of URL. 
         a/b/c.txt --> a/b
 a.txt     --> ""
 a/b/c     --> a/b
 a/b/c/    --> a/b/c

        Parameters:
        url - the url to query, null returns null
        Returns:
        the parent path of the url, or an empty string if none exists

      • resolveURL

        public static String resolveURL(String base,
                String add)
        resolve url to base 
           null                    + *             = *
   ""                      + *             = *
   http://a.b.c            + null          = http://a.b.c
   http://a.b.c            + ""            = http://a.b.c
   http://a.b.c            + http://x.y.z  = http://x.y.z
   http://a.b.c            + /x            = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/           + /x            = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/d          + /x            = null
   http://a.b.c/d/         + /x            = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/d/e        + /x            = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c            + ../x          = null
   http://a.b.c/           + ../x          = null
   http://a.b.c/d          + ../x          = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/d/e        + ../x          = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/d/e/       + ../x          = http://a.b.c/d/x
   http://a.b.c/d/e/f      + ../x          = http://a.b.c/d/x
   http://a.b.c            + x             = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/           + x             = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/d          + x             = http://a.b.c/x
   http://a.b.c/d/         + x             = http://a.b.c/d/x
   http://a.b.c/d/e        + x             = http://a.b.c/d/x
   /d/e                    + x             = /d/x
   /d/e                    + ../x          = /x
        Parameters:
        base - base url
        add - append url
        Returns:
        url url
